content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fixed Capacity is one of our most common models.  If you are staffed on a Fixed Capacity project, you can expect a team composition similar to this including a management tier and cross-functional team.\\n\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pop-up text with role descriptions:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – focuses on Business Development, Sales, SOW Pricing and Estimation, Account and Customer relationship management, Quarterly business reviews\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – EServe as middleman between Delivery Managers and Delivery Director. Escalation point on specific projects, Support Delivery Manager in issue resolution, Development of SOW (staffing/resource plan, assumptions, solution, risks), Project intake and initiation, including playbacks, Identify opportunities for team expansion, new skills, etc. within existing teams (not new), Collaborate with Program Manager on overall health of the program and client satisfaction\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PgM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – focuses on managing programs, establishing rescue plans for out-of-control projects, create and disseminate information on program health, financial spend and resource consumption \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – focuses on SOW execution, technical design, application development, testing, DevOps practices, data and infrastructure architecture, technology blueprints and roadmaps, track complexity and cost of ownership, manages dev recourses, delivery KPIs and improvements\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.7pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"+mn-ea\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"+mn-cs\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"color\":\"#222222\",\"mso-font-kerning\":\"12.0pt\",\"language\":\"en-US\",\"mso-style-textfill-type\":\"solid\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-color\":\"#222222\",\"mso-style-textfill-fill-alpha\":\"100.0%\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":77940,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e016f497-5410-4f00-baf9-814f674ff5d0/Captuoooooore.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e016f497-5410-4f00-baf9-814f674ff5d0/Captuoooooore.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Captuoooooore.PNG\",\"name\":\"Captuoooooore.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e016f497-5410-4f00-baf9-814f674ff5d0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":534.0478723404256},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
